The assignment brief is clearly written and well-presented. The tasks are appropriately challenging, offering students a considerable level of difficulty that aligns well with the demands of the programme.
Including the AI Assessment Scale (AIAS) is recognised as good practice, as it helps minimise the risk of inappropriate use of AI tools and potential plagiarism.
The author has provided a formal report outline structure to maintain the standard.
